item.description:
Alfresco serves Italian and Mediterranean cuisines.

Their brunch is very reasonable ranging from $7.00 to 20.00 per plate.
Very relaxing atmosphere for groups and one to one conversation.

This meet-up went last year for dinner and the price was reasonable,the food was awesome.

Some left with doggie bags.

I know the owner he is my neighbor and he will accommodate us.
Very nice gentleman..

The restaurant is handicap accessible.

I thought they excepted credit cards when I spoke to the hostess.
She was not sure so please bring enough cash for your meal and tip..
It would make it easier that way..

This establishment is close to the Red Line - Davis Square - Somerville.
Once you leave the station take a right onto Highland Ave.

Also if taking the MBTA you can take the Orange line to Sullivan Station and take any bus that goes to David Square.

I believe it is the 89, 90 and 93 but check mbta.com to make sure.
If driving do mapquest or Google to get directions.

Parking is free on Sundays.

If you are running late please call or text message me at 646-220-5707.

There will be a wait list so let me know if you are interested.

Love to see everyone before summer ends mostly Tonya...

Thanks - Jo-Ann
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside seated in the middle section of the restaurant..

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch At Alfresco........
